name: flash
description:
FLASH (Fast Length Adjustment of SHort reads) is a very fast and
accurate software tool to merge paired-end reads from next-generation
sequencing experiments.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe
dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.

dependent_to.name: py-crispresso
dependent_to.description:
Software pipeline for the analysis of CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing
outcomes from deep sequencing data.
